Isabella Rodriguez.name: Isabella Rodriguez
Isabella Rodriguez.preferences_in_transportation: prefers to drive for convenience and flexibility
Isabella Rodriguez.lifestyle: early riser, enjoys morning yoga, works long hours, socializes with friends on weekends
Isabella Rodriguez.other description: Isabella runs the town's popular coffee shop with a personal touch, knowing most regular customers by name. She attends morning yoga classes with Sophia Nguyen three times a week and hosts monthly coffee tasting events where Sophia Nguyen supplies specialty pastries.

Sophia Nguyen.name: Sophia Nguyen
Sophia Nguyen.preferences_in_transportation: cycles frequently, drives when transporting baked goods
Sophia Nguyen.lifestyle: early riser for baking, yoga practitioner
Sophia Nguyen.other description: Sophia's specialty pastries have developed a cult following in town. She supplies baked goods for Isabella Rodriguez's coffee shop.

Daniel Nguyen.name: Daniel Nguyen
Daniel Nguyen.preferences_in_transportation: takes metro to work, enjoys walking
Daniel Nguyen.other description: Daniel freelances on weekends designing logos for local businesses.
